title: I Notice:
questions: How your body feels — how do you feel inside your body?
example: (e.g. Louie’s body felt a little shaky, and he was breathing harder.)
name: I_Notice

title: I Feel:
questions: Use a “feeling word” to name the feeling.
example: (e.g. Louie names his feeling: Frustration. He also describes what’s happening that’s making him feel that way.)
name: I_Feel

title: I Can:
questions: Choose something that might help you manage the feeling.
example: (e.g. Louie names his feeling: Frustration. He also describes what’s happening that’s making him feel that way.)
name: I_Can
